message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this high-quality item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, based on my research and budget, I am only able to offer $8500 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000. What do you think?
